Title: The Fix
Plot: Hiro continues to search for a sword while being chased by mysterious figures.  An invisible man named Claude has something to teach one of the heroes. D.L. takes on new family responsibilities, and Matt opens up to his wife. H.R.G. continues to focus on the captive Sylar. Claire seeks out the Haitian and then her birth parents. Mohinder looks for those on the list, and receives a surprise visitor.  A psychiatrist offers to help Niki.
GuestStars: Paula Newsome, Brad Greenquist, Colby French, Jesse Corti, Dominic Testa, Jessalyn Gilsig
